title: Riverdance: The Animated Adventure
genres: Animation, Fantasy, Music, Adventure, Comedy, Family
overview: A young Irish boy named Keegan and Spanish girl named Moya journey into a magical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life. Based on the stage show phenomenon of the same name and featuring Bill Whelanâ€™s multi-platinum Grammy Award-winning music.
